sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Container, Typography, Link, Grid, Divider } from '@mui/material';
import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom';

function Footer() {
  return (
    <Box
      component="footer"
      sx={{
        py: 3,
        px: 2,
        mt: 'auto',
        backgroundColor: '#1a1a2e',
      }}
    >
      <Container maxWidth="lg">
        <Grid container spacing={4} justifyContent="space-between">
          <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
            <Typography variant="h6" color="#f48fb1" gutterBottom>
              YOUR LIE IN APRIL
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
              A beautiful anime about music, love, and finding your passion again.
            </Typography>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
            <Typography variant="h6" color="text.primary" gutterBottom>
              Quick Links
            </Typography>
            <Link component={RouterLink} to="/" color="text.secondary" display="block" sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
              Home
            </Link>
            <Link component={RouterLink} to="/episodes" color="text.secondary" display="block" sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
              Episodes
            </Link>
            <Link component={RouterLink} to="/about" color="text.secondary" display="block">
              About
            </Link>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
            <Typography variant="h6" color="text.primary" gutterBottom>
              Legal
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
              This is a demo website created for educational purposes only.
              All content belongs to their respective owners.
            </Typography>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
        <Divider sx={{ my: 2 }} />
        <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" align="center">
          {'© '}
          {new Date().getFullYear()}
          {' Your Lie in April Streaming. All rights reserved.'}
        </Typography>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default Footer;
